Procedure.treeFullPath: Upstream Kaseya Power Pack.MS Office And Office 365 Mgmnt 2018-10-26.Mac.MS Office 365 Deployment

Statement.description: Under development.
Statement.name: GetURL

Parameter.value: installer -pkg #vAgentConfiguration.agentTempDir#/Office2016.pkg -target /

Parameter.name: Comment
Parameter.value: UPSTREAM: Office 2016 deployed or updated to latest version.

Procedure.name: Application Deployment - Windows - Office365 For Business Example - Danish - Deploy Latest
Procedure.treeFullPath: Upstream Kaseya Power Pack.MS Office And Office 365 Mgmnt 2018-10-26.Windows.MS Office 365 Deployment.Danish

Statement.description: Procedure description: Deploy latest Office 365 For Business Premium build. Components: Outlook, Skype For Business, OneDrive, Word, Excel, Powerpoint, Publisher, Access Kaseya customer value: Standardize the Office 365 deployment process. End user value: Quick and standardized software deployment process. Dependencies: Windows OS. Usage: Schedule or Run Now. Report options: Agent Procedure log. Look for before, during and after update deployment statements. Maintainer: powerpack@upstream.se Last change: 2017-03-31 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Statement.name: GetURL

Parameter.name: Comment
Parameter.value: UPSTREAM: Office365 MSI installer downloaded successfully.

Parameter.name: Arguments
Parameter.value: /i #vAgentConfiguration.agentTempDir#\o365.msi /L*V "#vAgentConfiguration.agentTempDir#\o365deploy.log"

Parameter.name: Comment
Parameter.value: UPSTREAM: Office 365 installation: The MSI installer spawns a Click-2-Run process to pull Office 365 over the Intenet. We create a 10 min pause to let that process finish up.

Statement.description: The MSI installer spawns a Click-2-Run process to pull Office 365 over the Intenet. We create a 10 min pause to let that process finish up.
Statement.name: PauseScript

Parameter.name: Comment
Parameter.value: UPSTREAM: Office 365 installation: Complete. Components: Outlook, Skype For Business, OneDrive, Word, Excel, Powerpoint, Publisher, Access. Evaluate the log file: "#vAgentConfiguration.agentTempDir#\o365deploy.log"

Statement.description: Some house cleaning
Statement.name: DeleteFile

Parameter.name: Comment
Parameter.value: UPSTREAM: Office 365 installation: The Agent Procedure hit the last row and will now exit. Evaluate the Agent Procedure log output.

Procedure.name: Repair Application - Windows - Office 365 Full Online Repair - No User Interaction
Procedure.treeFullPath: Upstream Kaseya Power Pack.MS Office And Office 365 Mgmnt 2018-10-26.Windows.MS Office 365 Repair

If.description: Procedure description: Full online repair for Office 365 installation silently without user interaction. Kaseya customer value: Enhanced support experience. Quickly troubleshooting Office 365 realted problems. End user value: Enhanced support experience. Dependencies: Office 365. Usage: Schedule Once or Run Now. Report options: Agent Procedure log. Look for "UPSTREAM: Office 365 Online Repair". Maintainer: powerpack@upstream.se ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Parameter.name: Path
Parameter.value: c:\program\common files\microsoft shared\ClickToRun\officeclicktorun.exe

Parameter.name: Comment
Parameter.value: UPSTREAM: Office 365 Full Online Repair: Click2Run.exe exists. Contiuing .

Parameter.name: Path
Parameter.value: c:\program\common files\microsoft shared\ClickToRun\officeclicktorun.exe

Parameter.name: Arguments
Parameter.value: scenario=Repair forceappshutdown=True repairtype=FullRepair Displaylevel=False

Parameter.name: Comment
Parameter.value: UPSTREAM: Office 365 Full Online Repair: Click2Run.exe does not exist. Aborting.

Parameter.name: Comment
Parameter.value: UPSTREAM: Office 365 Full Online Repair: The Agent Procedure hit the last row and will now exit. Evaluate the Agent Procedure log output.

Parameter.name: Path
Parameter.value: c:\program\common files\microsoft shared\ClickToRun\officeclicktorun.exe

Parameter.name: Arguments
Parameter.value: scenario=Repair forceappshutdown=True repairtype=QuickRepair Displaylevel=False

Parameter.name: Comment
Parameter.value: UPSTREAM: Office 365 Quick Repair: Click2Run.exe does not exist. Aborting.

Parameter.name: Comment
Parameter.value: UPSTREAM: Office 365 Quick Repair: The Agent Procedure hit the last row and will now exit. Evaluate the Agent Procedure log output.

Procedure.name: Remove Application - Windows - Remove Office 2003
Procedure.treeFullPath: Upstream Kaseya Power Pack.MS Office And Office 365 Mgmnt 2018-10-26.Windows.MS Office Application Removal

Statement.description: Procedure description: Procedure to completely remove specific Offic product without user interaction. Kaseya customer value: Removes any manual interaction when uninstalling Microsoft Office. End user value: No end user interaction needed. Dependencies: Windows OS. Usage: Schedule or Run Now. Report options: Look for log #vAgentConfiguration.agentTempDir#\OfficeRemoval.log Maintainer: powerpack@upstream.se Last change: 2018-05-04 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ https://github.com/OfficeDev/Office-IT-Pro-Deployment-Scripts/tree/master/Office-ProPlus-Deployment/Remove-PreviousOfficeInstalls
Statement.name: GetURL

Parameter.name: Comment
Parameter.value: UPSTREAM: Executing cscript #vAgentConfiguration.agentTempDir#\Offscrub.vbs, logs at #vAgentConfiguration.agentTempDir#\OffScrub_Logs

Parameter.name: Command
Parameter.value: cscript #vAgentConfiguration.agentTempDir#\OffScrub.vbs ALL /Q /NoCancel /BYPASS 1 /Log #vAgentConfiguration.agentTempDir#\OfficeRemoval.log

Parameter.name: Comment
Parameter.value: UPSTREAM: Ending Office 2003 removal.
